a book that is published every year by a school or other organization to give facts about the events and achievements of the previous year

Add to word list
a book published every year by a company, an organization, a country, etc. that gives facts about events and achievements of the previous year or present year: The ILO's yearbook of statistics shows that Americans are overworked by international standards.
